Class UserProfiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserProfiles

  •  class UserProfiles
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all Profile Data.
    Version:
    2.0, June 10 2013
    Author:
    Richard shi

      • getUserProfile

        public Profile getUserProfile(java.lang.String userId)
        Gets a user Profile by its userId

        Local Variable Dictionary:

        p: Reference Variable for Profile. Temporarily holds every Profile in the list.

        Parameters:
        userId - The String to identify a profile with.
        Returns:
        The user Profile with the matching user ID. Returns null if it doesn't exist.

      • updateUserProfile

        public boolean updateUserProfile(Profile p)
        Updates user profile.
        Parameters:
        p - The Profile to update.
        Returns:
        A boolean variable that displays Whether the profile was updated correctly or not.

      • addUser

        public boolean addUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Adds user to the list of Profiles. Local Variable Dictionary:

        p: Reference Variable for Profile to be added to the list.

        Parameters:
        userId - The String that will be the new Profiles User ID.
        Returns:
        A boolean variable that displays Whether the profile with the User id Already exists or not.

      • removeUser

        public boolean removeUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Removes user from profile list. Local Variable Dictionary:

        i: int loop variable

        Parameters:
        userId - String reference variable. This method removes the Profile with this userID.
        Returns:
        Whether the profile to be remove was found or not.

      • isUserExists

        public boolean isUserExists(java.lang.String userId)
        Checks whether a user exists in the list or not.

        Local Variable Dictionary:

        p : Reference Variable for profile. Used to temporarily hold all profiles.

        Parameters:
        userId - String reference variable. This method checks whether a Profile exists in the list with this userID.
        Returns:
        Whether the profile exists in the list or not.

      • SaveProfile

        public static void SaveProfile(java.lang.String fileName,
               UserProfiles profiles)
        Saves the current list of profiles into the XML file.

        Local Variable Dictionary

        file: Reference variable for File. Holds File representation of user Profiles File.

        jc: Reference variable for JAXBContext. Provides a way to access XML binding methods.

        marshaller: Reference variable for Marshaller. Reads in data from a userProfiles class and saves it to the XML file.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String reference variable. Holds the filename of the file to save to.
        profiles - Reference variable for UserProfiles. Holds the class to get data from to save to file.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - XML marshalling failure.

      • LoadProfile

        public static UserProfiles LoadProfile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads the current list of profiles from the XML profile file.

        Local Variable Dictionary

        file: Reference variable for File. Holds File representation of user Profiles File.

        jc: Reference variable for JAXBContext. Provides a way to access XML binding methods.

        unmarshaller: Reference variable for Unmarshaller. Reads in data from a user Profiles XML file and loads it into a userProfiles class.

        profiles: Reference Variable for UserProfiles. Holds class to load data into.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String reference variable. Holds the filename of the file to load from.
        Returns:
        UserProfiles class with data loaded in.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - XML marshalling failure.
